items.sentence: Tom has spoken with me many times about that.
I just assumed everything was going to be OK.
That blue car over there is the one I rented.
That cost a lot more than I thought it would.
That incident happened when Tom was thirteen.
That kind of behavior is just not acceptable.
That man over there might be our new teacher.
I won\'t pretend to be someone that I\'m not.
Isn\'t this what you\'ve been dreaming about?
I don\'t want Tom thinking I don\'t like him.
I don\'t want Tom to think I\'m not grateful.
I don\'t want anybody to know that I\'m rich.
I don\'t understand why it\'s taking so long.
If Tom doesn\'t want me to do that, I won\'t.
You\'re a regular customer here, aren\'t you?
Tom is one of the rudest guys I\'ve ever met.
Why can\'t people just be nice to each other?
Don\'t try doing two things at the same time.
Tom and Mary renovated their home completely.
Tom and Mary were both wearing rubber gloves.
